# Rename Certificate

If you have multiple certificates for the same vendor program, you can choose different names for those certificates so you can easily identify them in your list of certificates.&#x20;

Certificates can be renamed regardless of their state. It means you can rename expired and terminated certificates as well.&#x20;

There are two ways to rename a certificate. You can do this from the Certificate Details page or the Program Details page.&#x20;

## Renaming a certificate

To rename a certificate from the Certificate Details page:

1. Navigate to the **Certificates** page in the platform. The page is located under **Marketplace** in the main navigation menu.
2. Select the certificate you want to rename.
3. On the certificate details page, select the arrow<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">and choose **Rename**.
4. In the **Rename** dialog, enter the new name. We recommend providing a unique name so you can identify it easily.
5. Select **Save**.

To rename a certificate from the Program Details page:

1. Navigate to the **Programs** page in the platform. The page is located under **Marketplace** in the main navigation menu.
2. Select the program for which you want to rename the certificate.
3. On the program details page, select the **Certificates** tab.
4. Select the required certificate.
5. On the certificate details page, select the arrow<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">and choose **Rename**.
6. In the **Rename** dialog, enter the new name. We recommend providing a unique name so you can identify it easily.
7. Select **Save**.

Your certificate is renamed, and the new name is reflected on all pages displaying the certificate within the platform.
